articles.content: Razer has a habit of showing up at CES with wild concept hardware that it never releases, but the Tomahawk gaming PC it showed off at last year’s event is becoming a reality. The ultra-compact PC wil… [+2336 chars]

articles.author: Taylor Lyles
articles.title: PAX still plans to host its in-person game festivals in 2021 - The Verge
articles.description: Following the cancellation of PAX West in September due to the coronavirus, ReedPop and Penny Arcade announced it will resume its PAX gaming conventions in June 2021, pending improvements to the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
Pending public health improvements
Image: Penny Arcade
ReedPop and Penny Arcade, the organizers of the PAX gaming conventions, announced on Friday that they plan to resume PAX East, West, and Unplu… [+1262 chars]
